name: Angry Zombies
description:
No mercy !

Important point

➡ 30 unpublished levels!
➡ Scoring system!
➡ Hardcore mode!
➡ Immersive sound atmosphere!
➡ Addictive!



There must be none left! In Angry Zombies you have to shoot down all the zombies you will encounter. But beware ! Their villages are solid and your shots are limited. Be precise and do not make prisoners!
You will travel 30 unpublished levels accompanied by a sound atmosphere to immerse yourself in the skin of a zombie hunter!
Be careful ! You will meet enemies stronger and stronger than others.

Two game modes are available!
- Easy: No constraints.
- Hard: You will have no indication of trajectory and firepower.

How to make the best score?
You just have to shoot down a village in a minimum of fire!
 
Are you going to be the best zombie hunter?
Share your scores and battle photos in the Steam community of zombie hunters.

Welcome to the Angry Zombies Adventure!
